import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import Status from "./cognito-api/Status"; import { AccountContext } from "../components/cognito-api/Account"; import './Header.css' function Header(props) { const authctx = useContext(AccountContext); const isLoggedIn = authctx.isLoggedIn; const logOutHandler = () => { authctx.logout(); } const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); return ( <>
Wanderlust setQuery(e.target.value)} />
